title: Premium Discord Community
description: Launch a paid Discord server with exclusive content, live sessions, and direct access to you.

steps.details: Evaluate platform options based on your audience and budget. Discord is free and familiar to gaming/tech audiences. Circle is $89/mo but more professional.
Research competitor pricing. Recommend single tier for launch ($37-47/mo). Include founding member discount (30-40% off).

what_works: Weekly live Q&A sessions create rhythm and accountability
Founding member pricing (discounted) builds initial momentum
Personal DMs to top 50 engaged followers converts at 15-20%
common_failures: Launching to empty server without founding members

title: Mini-Course Series
description: Create 3-5 focused mini-courses on your most popular topics. Each course is short (1-2 hours) and actionable.

steps.task: Identify top 3-5 course topics from content analysis
steps.details: Review your highest-engagement content. Look for topics where audience asks 'how do I' questions most.

what_works: Repurposing existing tutorial content saves 50%+ time
Shorter courses (1-2 hours) have higher completion rates
Bundle pricing (buy 3, get 4th free) increases AOV

title: Group Coaching Program
description: Run cohort-based group coaching with 8-12 clients. Mix of group calls and community support.

steps.details: 8-12 week program. Weekly group calls (90 min). Private community. Clear transformation promise.

title: Brand Sponsorship Program
description: Structured program for brand partnerships and sponsored content with clear packages and pricing.

steps.task: Create media kit with stats and packages
steps.details: Professional PDF with audience demographics, engagement metrics, past successes, and 3-tier pricing.

title: Community + Course Bundle
description: Combine paid community with structured courses. Members get both for a bundled price.

steps.details: Community for ongoing support, courses for structured learning. Bundle pricing creates compelling value.

title: Strategic Affiliate Program
description: Curate and promote products you genuinely use, earning commissions on sales.

steps.details: Sign up for Amazon Associates, ShareASale, Impact, and niche-specific programs relevant to your content.
Build 'My Setup' or 'Recommended Tools' page with affiliate links and honest reviews.

what_works: Only promote products you actually use builds trust
Resource page converts 5-10% of traffic
Tutorial content with affiliate links performs best
common_failures: Promoting too many products dilutes recommendations
Not disclosing affiliate relationships damages trust
Choosing high-ticket items with low conversion rates

title: Premium Newsletter Subscription
description: Weekly or bi-weekly paid newsletter with exclusive insights, analysis, and resources.

steps.details: Substack is easiest (free, 10% fee). ConvertKit or Beehiiv offer more control. Ghost for full ownership.
Decide on weekly vs bi-weekly. Define sections (e.g., main analysis, resources, community spotlight). Create template.

what_works: Consistent schedule builds habit in readers
Annual pricing (2 months free) locks in revenue
Free preview issues convert 2-5% of audience

title: 1-on-1 Coaching Program
description: High-touch personal coaching with limited availability. Premium pricing for direct access.

steps.details: Typical: Single session ($200-300), 4-session package ($700-1000), 12-session intensive ($2000-4000). Include email support.

steps.task: Set up booking and payment system
steps.details: Use Calendly (free) + Stripe for payments, or TidyCal ($29 one-time). Block specific hours for coaching.

what_works: Limiting slots creates scarcity and urgency
Package pricing (4-6 sessions) increases commitment
Success stories from past clients drive referrals

title: Digital Templates & Resources
description: Sell templates, presets, worksheets, or other digital downloads your audience needs.

steps.details: Review comments/DMs for 'how do you do X' or 'can you share your template for Y'. Start with 1-3 products.
Use Canva, Notion, Figma, or native tools. Make them easy to customize. Include instruction PDF.

what_works: Bundles (3-5 templates) sell better than individual
Gumroad or Lemon Squeezy handle payments easily
Showing before/after results increases conversions

title: All-Access Membership Site
description: Monthly membership with full library of courses, resources, and ongoing content.

steps.details: Kajabi ($149/mo) for all-in-one. Teachable ($39/mo) + Circle for courses+community. WordPress + MemberPress for control.
Start with 5-10 pieces of existing content. Add 1-2 new resources per month. Balance library growth with sustainability.

what_works: Netflix model: Access to everything for one price
Drip content keeps members engaged longer
Founder tier (locked pricing) rewards early adopters

title: Branded Merchandise Line
description: Sell physical products (apparel, accessories, prints) with your branding or designs.

steps.details: Hire designer on Fiverr ($50-100/design) or use Canva. Simple, recognizable designs work best. Test with polls.
Printful or Printify integrate with Shopify. No inventory risk. 3-5 day fulfillment. 25-35% profit margins.

what_works: Limited drops create urgency and FOMO
Pre-orders validate demand before production
Quality over quantity - 3 great designs beats 20 mediocre ones

title: Live Workshop Series
description: Host paid live workshops on specific topics. 2-4 hour intensive sessions with Q&A.

steps.details: Pick your most-asked 'how to' topics. Each workshop should deliver one clear skill or outcome.
Use Eventbrite (free + fees) or Carrd ($19/year) + TidyCal. Clear outcome, agenda, pricing, date/time.

what_works: Weekend workshops (Saturday mornings) get best attendance
Recording included increases perceived value
Early bird pricing (30% off) drives initial sales

title: Content Licensing Program
description: License your content, photos, videos, or courses to businesses and educators.

steps.details: Identify high-quality photos, videos, courses, or frameworks. Ensure you own all rights. Organize by category.
Single-use ($500-1000), unlimited use ($2000-5000), custom courses ($5000+). Include usage rights clearly.

what_works: Target specific industries (corporate training, agencies)
Case studies showing ROI increase deal size
White-label options command premium pricing

title: Niche Software Tool
description: Build a simple software tool that solves a specific problem for your audience.

steps.details: Survey audience about their biggest workflow pain. Find the smallest valuable solution. Build one feature well.
Build yourself if technical. Or hire dev on Upwork ($25-50/hr, $2000-4000 for MVP). Use no-code tools when possible.

what_works: Solve your own problem first - best product market fit
Free tier with paid upgrades converts 2-5%
Lifetime deals for early adopters fund development

title: Certification Program
description: Comprehensive training program with certification. Premium pricing for professional credential.

steps.details: 6-12 week program. Mix of video lessons, projects, assessments. Clear learning outcomes. Professional certificate at end.
Define what mastery looks like. Projects + quizzes + final exam. Passing score 80%+. Professional certificate design.

what_works: Job placement support justifies premium pricing
Alumni network adds long-term value
Employer recognition increases certification value

title: Done-For-You Service
description: Offer high-value service doing what you teach. Implementation for those who'd rather pay than DIY.

steps.details: What do you teach that people would pay to have done? Define scope, deliverables, timeline. 3 tiers: Essential, Premium, Elite.
Standardize your process. Client onboarding form, project checklist, delivery templates. Makes service scalable.

what_works: Limited slots per month maintains quality
50% upfront payment qualifies serious clients
Case studies drive referrals and premium pricing

title: Exclusive Mastermind
description: High-ticket peer group program. Small cohort (6-12 people) with intense collaboration and accountability.

steps.details: 6-12 months commitment. Monthly full-day sessions (virtual or in-person). Private Slack/community. Clear member criteria.
Application form with goals, business stage, challenges. 30-min interview with each candidate. Select for peer fit and commitment.

what_works: Small size (6-12) enables deep relationships
Vetting process ensures committed, compatible members
In-person annual retreat justifies premium pricing

title: Boutique Content Agency
description: Build small agency creating content for brands in your niche. Leverage your expertise and style.

steps.details: Monthly retainers: 4 posts ($3k), 8 posts ($5k), 12 posts + strategy ($8k). Include strategy, creation, posting.

steps.task: Build small team or contractor network
steps.details: Start solo, add contractors as you scale. Editor ($25/hr), videographer ($50/hr), strategist ($40/hr). Pay per project initially.

what_works: Niche focus (e.g., fitness brands only) commands premium
Case studies with ROI metrics win enterprise clients
Minimum 3-month contracts ensure stability

title: Published Book or Comprehensive eBook
description: Write and self-publish a book on your expertise. Digital and/or physical versions.

steps.details: Repurpose your best content. 8-15 chapters. Each chapter solves one problem or teaches one concept. 30,000-50,000 words.
Write 500-1000 words daily. 12 weeks to complete. Don't edit while writing - just get words down. AI can help with structure.
Hire editor on Reedsy ($500-1000). Use Canva for cover or hire designer ($100-300). Format for Kindle and print.

steps.task: Publish on Amazon KDP and Gumroad
steps.details: Amazon KDP for Kindle and paperback (70% royalty on Kindle). Gumroad for PDF version ($19-29). Launch to your audience.

what_works: Launch week push to your audience gets initial sales
Book establishes authority, drives other revenue streams
Price at $19-29 for perceived value (not $10)

title: YouTube Channel Membership
description: Enable YouTube memberships with exclusive perks for monthly supporters.

steps.details: 2-3 tiers ($4.99, $9.99, $24.99). Perks: custom badges, emojis, members-only posts, early access, BTS content, monthly livestream.

steps.task: Create welcome video and perks content
steps.details: Record welcome video explaining membership. Create first batch of exclusive content. Set up members-only community posts schedule.

what_works: Shoutouts in videos drive membership signups
Monthly members-only livestreams create value
Custom badges make members feel special and visible
